title: ITPO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 31 Deputy Manager Posts
description: The India Trade Promotion Organisation (ITPO) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 31 Deputy Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering, Diploma, Any Degree, LLB, MBA, can apply for ITPO Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
